DOC.brief_summary: Coronary artery disease is a common medical disease in many populations. The pathogenesis of this disease is very complex. Surgery is one of the treatment choices. Assessing the risk factors will improve the surgical outcome. In this study some biochemical parameters were evaluated to find out the relationship between these parameters (electrolytes and albumin vs)
DOC.brief_title: Hyponatremia and Hypoalbuminemia is Morbimortality Predictors in Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients who underwent coronary artery bypass graft surgery Elective surgery Pediatric patients Offpump surgery Emergent surgery
